content.rendered:
We celebrate 6 years since our foundation in the UK and we look back on a journey that has seen us expand to serve all parts of the globe, and service all offshore energy markets. 

Thanks to our wonderful staff, customers, partners and contractors; we are proud to now be recognised as one of the leading providers of offshore technical consultancy services.

As we celebrate, we thank everyone who has contributed to the last 6 years and we look forward to continuing the Aqualis story, focusing on technical excellence, quality and service all based around a world class team.

excerpt.rendered: We celebrate 6 years since our foundation in the UK and we look back on a journey that has seen us expand to serve all parts of the globe, and service all offshore energy markets.
